body.name: Easy-Off Heavy Duty Oven Cleaner, Regular Scent 14.5 oz Can
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 16 mins
features: HEAVY DUTY OVEN CLEANER: Specially formulated to penetrate tough, burned-on grease and food in as little as 3 minutes
MULTIPURPOSE: Use to clean ovens, oven doors, barbecue grills, broilers, broiler pans and stainless-steel surfaces
FOR OCCASIONAL DEEP CLEANING: Great for occasional deep cleaning or everyday tough spot cleanings. Use on warm or cold surfaces
EASY TO USE: Just spray on the stain, wait, and wipe
body.description: Easy-Off Heavy Duty Oven Cleaner is specially formulated to penetrate tough baked-on grease and food spills in as little as 5 minutes! Great for occasional deep cleaning or everyday tough spot cleanings. Effectively cleans warm or cold ovens. Ideal for cleaning ovens, oven doors, barbecue grills, broilers, broiler pans, and stainless steel surfaces. Cook with passion. Clean with Easy-off!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So first things first, I would recommend getting some sort of face mask before using this stuff, because it’s super strong and is very chemically. But it works so SO well. I did the warm clean option on our old oven in our rental house (so it’s probably never been cleaned before like ever). I wish I had taken a before picture, but I at least have an after picture. It’s not perfect, but looks exponentially better than it did before. I did have to wipe clean with a wet towel and then behind that a dry towel, and had to do this multiple times to ensure all the product was gone. If I didn’t it left like white streaks. I think I used too much though. Anwyas, I highly recommend! Just make sure you open a window and get a mask before using, because this stuff cannot be good to breathe in lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed with its effectiveness
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried Easy-Off Heavy Duty Oven Cleaner, and I'm impressed with its effectiveness. The cleaner effortlessly removes tough oven stains, making the cleaning process a breeze. Its user-friendly design adds to the convenience, making it easy to use. Overall, I highly recommend Easy-Off Heavy Duty Oven Cleaner for anyone looking for a reliable and efficient solution to keep their oven sparkling clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive! Easy-Off did a great job cleaning up my 16 year-old Oven
reviews.reviewText: Although my oven has a 'Self Clean" function, I've read about some owners having failure issues with their ovens after using the feature due to the extremely high temperatures of the Self-clean damaging some of the internal wiring/electronics in the oven. With my oven on it's 16th year, I thought I'd try Easy-Off versus risking damaging my oven and, "Wow," I'm impressed. Following the directions, I sprayed the oven and let it sit for 15 minutes. The bulk of the burnt greased cleaned up after the first application. A few stubborn areas I sprayed again and let sit for 30 minutes, and they cleaned up, as well. The other benefit of the Easy-Off versus Self-Clean, is that the Easy-Off allows you to clean the door edges that won't clean up with a Self-clean option. Very happy with the results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very strong and works like it says. Only bad thing i can say is it does have a small odor but goes away quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars worked well for a gunsmithing project.
reviews.reviewText: Works well on getting the old linseed oil from a Lee Enfield No.4 Mk1 stock and handguards. Be sure to do multiple washes with water and dish soap to neutralize the Easy-Off or you will rust your barrel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We absolutely loved this product for cleaning our oven! We hadn't cleaned the oven since we moved in horrible I know! Bottom of the oven was black and we considered using the self cleaning feature on the oven but were concerned w fumes and maybe catching fire.We sprayed on and wiped after 30 min. Amazing how much had come off then. Agree if your oven is super dirty like ours was it worked best to spray it before bed and then leave overnight. I did have to give certain areas a second of cleaning. But it looked like a brand new oven when we got done with minimal elbow grease and work. We should have used this product years ago! Only thing to be sure is you wipe all product clear as we did notice white areas after drying where we hadn't wiped it all clear. Otherwise amazing and everyone needs to add this to their household supply list.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently moved out of my place of 14 years. Thru the years I had lot of roomates, and cleaning was always more difficult with other people adding. My oven has always suffered under used of people that never clean it. I haven't used my oven for some years, as I'm not a baker, but when i was moving out I realized how bad and dirty it was inside. So much layers of grime! I bought this product after watching some YouTube video for best over cleaning products! And wow! This cleaned 14 years of grime like nothing! I had to do it few times, which was understandable after so many years! But after few days of repeat and scrubs the oven looked like new inside! Couldn't even believe it! So, then I decided to use the spray for my Air Fryer pan that I inherited for free and was very brown instead of chrome. And just one soak and scrub the air fryer pan is silver again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Top notch oven cleaner which is tough on greasy grime and residue. Takes a lot of the work out of cleaning. No more scrubbing. Also works well on the bottom of heavily used sauce pans.❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit sceptical about this product, as it is quite expensive. But, you get what you pay for. I left the product on for 30 minutes not 3. As my shelves were quite messy. I was astonished as to how easy it was to then clean them. I did use a scouring pad, but it certainly came up cleaner and a lot quicker than other products I have used in the past. No messy bag or leaving it overnight either. I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is brilliant and cleaned my oven so well. I would say that it still is quite smelly but not as bad as others I have used. Would recommend wearing a mask or using in a well ventilated room still.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works like magic. I sprayed on a cold oven and left overnight. Literally ALL stains came off with a wipe. Best oven cleaner I’ve ever had

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: One of the better cleaning products i have bought and so easy to use, it does what it says on the tin, excuse the pun 😁👍.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: This stuff is just amazing for removing burned on stains.
reviews.reviewText: Have tried several other products for removing burned on stains to the textured glass surface of a combined microwave / convection oven turntable. The textured finish meant that conventional cleaning just wiped over the stains which were recessed into the fine "dimples" of the surface. I even resorted to taking it outside and using my pressure washer to try blasting it to removing the marks but nothing worked.Finally tried this and all I can say is that it's amazing stuff... spray on, leave for a few minutes and wipe off it was as simple as that. I had to do a couple off applications to get rid of the more stubborn stains but considering what I had tried previously this stuff is simply miraculous.
